reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one noting it looks like a premium piece, and they appreciate its flattering fit that accentuates curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This was bought as the base piece for a Megera costume for a teen who is a size 0 and 5' 4". The dress is beautiful, it's often hard to find pieces for my daughter's slender frame without one portion or another fitting poorly. This dress is a poly knit and has a stretch to the fabric. It has adjustable straps which allow for a better fit. The fabric is a nice quality, very soft and not too thin. The cowl in the front and back drape well with an attractive lace inset in the back. The only adjustment that will need to be made for my daughter is length as it is extremely long and even with heels will drag the floor. This is a bonus if you are tall girl however. Read more
items.author: agentq8s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a flattering elegant dress!
items.body: I wore this to a wedding! I’m 5’6”. 125 lbs. Small fit perfectly. I had it in black. I used the adhesive bras for the first time but did not need to connect together. The drape looked beautiful and you wouldn’t need to wear one but I didn’t want to be showing through the fabric and unfortunately that’s really hard to compensate for with me. I did NOT have trouble with straps at all. They did not fall or loosen. I danced a lot. I received so many compliments. Not Dr through, still thin fabric but the perfect weight. This dress was remarkably comfortable and flattering…forgiving. It fit right up on my curves and I’m someone who will be very picky about that for hips, booty, thighs due to cellulite. No spanx and this was just smooth. I’m going to purchase another dark color and see if the miracle holds true!!! All I can say is that this dress will be a staple of mine and I recommend it completely! Get ready for compliments!! Elegant and sexy. Will add photos later! Read more
items.author: Kerroline

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than expected. I'm 5'1 and it was the perfect length!
items.body: Pretty dress, much better material than I expected, and not see through. It's flattering on even though I don't have boobs really. I'm 119lbs and 5'1 and the length is perfect. Thick material and breathable. Much much comfier than expected but the straps are annoying sitting just under my armpit and falling (probably because of lack in chest area lol). I'm going to a wedding and this was exactly what I was hoping for. Read more
items.author: Trinity Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get the dress it’s worth it
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress that is comfortable and sexy. I’d say for me it fit kind of lose on the top simply because I’m smaller on top than the bottom. But the bottom part of the dress was perfect. My favorite dress by far. Read more
items.author: Benjamin C.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super see through in white
items.body: This is one of the most flattering dresses but I would not suggest it in white. Material is super stretchy and feels like a spandex material, but in the white dress you can see everything, even nude underwear. I bought this dress in red, amazing. Just wouldn’t suggest the white. I am 5’6, 135 pounds and I am typically a size 4 and I ordered a small, fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Michael Ritz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is so much better in person!
items.body: This dress is so much more vibrant in person! The fit was so flattering and would genuinely look good on almost any body type. The material was soft and stretchy, and the length was perfect for a tall girl (5’10) like me. The straps slipped every once in a while but I could still dance comfortably in it, and they’re adjustable. Read more
items.author: Benjamin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super pretty!
items.body: I haven't worn the dress yet but it looks exactly like the pictures and is absolutely beautiful. I tried it on and felt so sexy. I'm saving it for a date night but it's super pretty and worth the process. Read more
items.author: Tafari Rhodes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress fit
items.body: Very fitted but also stretchy. Material is soft but not very thick so there is some sheerness to the dress in lighter colors. Good quality Read more
items.author: Sissy Lynn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Evening Mermaid Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Evening Mermaid Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Evening Mermaid Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Tie Dye Blue, Black, Coffee, Rose Red, Blue Flower, Royal Blue, Leopard, Reddish Orange, Sapphire Blue, Sky Blue, Gray, Violet, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
